description_us1: I am a junior web developer passionate about creating innovative solutions.
description_us2: Site or web application Compatible with Mobile, Tablets  and PC.
description_card1: Create a travel agency homepage with HTML & CSS, by integrating the webpage of Booki, a vacation booking platform.
description_card2: Improve the interface of a mobile site with CSS animations Implement a foodtech site mobile first with CSS animations. Github links Visit the site.
description_card3: Optimize the natural referencing of a photographer's site Help my client appear at the top of Google search results thanks to good SEO and accessibility practices.
description_card4: Create a real estate rental web application with React Implement the front end of Kasa, a housing rental application.
description_about:
I am currently looking for an employer to complete my work-study program as part of the Applications Developer training with a specialization in JavaScript, for a minimum period of 12 months. This training is carried out under a professionalization contract and includes a flexible schedule of 3 to 4 days per week within your organization, with training days established in agreement with you. The skills developed during this training are immediately applicable, guaranteeing a rapid and effective contribution within your team. A dedicated mentor will follow me throughout my journey to maximize my learning and efficiency. In addition, the training center supports you at every stage, from recruitment to training, while simplifying the administrative management of the work-study program.

For more information on the work-study program, you can contact me by email or telephone. I remain at your disposal to arrange an interview and discuss how I could join and strengthen your team.

Pending your response, please accept, Madam, Sir, the expression of my distinguished greetings.
